name: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
scenarioId: schedule_availability:Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
methodName: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor

testSteps.description: Given the doctor "carlos.santana@example.com" with password "medico1234" is on the schedules page
When he clicks on the add schedule button for "Carlos Santana"

And he adds a new availability with the following data
| Field | Value |
| Start Date | 2025-08-01 |
| End Date | 2025-08-05 |
| Start Time | 09:00 |
| End Time | 13:00 |
Then he should see a success message that says "Â¡Franja horaria agregada exitosamente!"

userStory.narrative:
As a doctor
  I want to add time slots to my own schedule

title: Successfully add a new time slot for a doctor
